  • This blog has been running stably for x day, y hours and z minutes
  • Published x articles in total · totaling y k words
  • The total number of visits to this site is x times

<!-- Add blog running time -->
<script>
    let s1 = '2023-6-18'; //website start date
    s1 = new Date(s1.replace(/-/g, "/"));
    let s2 = new Date();
    let timeDifference = s2.getTime() - s1.getTime();

    let days = Math.floor(timeDifference / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
    let hours = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
    let minutes = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
    document.getElementById('ds').innerHTML = days;
    document.getElementById('hs').innerHTML = hours;
    document.getElementById('ms').innerHTML = minutes;

</script>

item.title: 博客bug日志
item.description:
bug日志

2023-06-20-16:30:34

bug描述

博客评论功能不可用，具体表现为：

  • 博客末评论处尾显示"未找到相关的 Issues 进行评论，请联系xxx初始化创建"字样
  • 点击"使用GitHub登录"后跳转回该博客，无其他反应

bug溯源

Google查到可能是博客uri过长，经排查后发现并不是该问题导致

观察后发现页面跳转时候地址栏网址后带了错误参数"error=redirect_urixxx"等字样，推测是GitHub回调错误。

排查后发现是由于之前绑定了 blog.mulinbiao.com 域名，未更新GitHub OAuth 配置的 callback 导致

bug修复

打开GitHub settings -> developer settings -> OAuth Apps，将APP配置的 Homepage URL 和 Authorization callback URL 改为 https://blog.mulinbiao.com/ 即可
